rawMaterials.name: Cotton

rawMaterials.description: Smooth texture with excellent drape and comfort properties

rawMaterials.name: Poly Yarn
rawMaterials.description: Enhanced durability and shape retention for extended wear

rawMaterials.name: Nylon
rawMaterials.description: Provides strength and elasticity to sock construction

rawMaterials.name: Acrylic
rawMaterials.description: Lightweight and warm, ideal for blended fabric compositions

rawMaterials.name: Polyester
rawMaterials.description: Quick-dry properties and color retention for active wear

rawMaterials.name: Olefin
rawMaterials.description: Moisture-resistant and lightweight for performance applications

rawMaterials.name: Lycra
rawMaterials.description: Superior stretch and recovery for comfortable, form-fitting socks

rawMaterials.name: Spandex
rawMaterials.description: Excellent elasticity and shape retention for athletic and comfort socks
